device.unsupported: Your device are unsupported to use this API
device.noBase: You don't have much base to use this API, required base: 6MB

node.unsupportedNode: Unsupported node version, the required node is: 16 or higher

status.errorCodeStatus: $ echo err status code R?{statusCode.displayStatus}D $$ err

APIerrors.unsupportedVersion: unsupported API version, required version is: 3.0 or higher

disconnectErrors.APIdisconnected: API disconnected, $ echo err api disconnected R?{API.disconnectMessage}D $$ err
disconnectErrors.websocketDisconnected: WebSocket disconnected, $ echo err websocket disconnected R?{API.websocket.status('DISCONNECTED').sendMessage()}D $$ err
disconnectErrors.handler Disconnected: $ echo err handler disconnected R?{API.fetch('handler').name || API.handler.name || API.handler.undefined}D $$ disconnected

requests.APImoduleRequest: $ echo request R?{API.fetch(request => request.message(echo new requestMessage, {type: 'moduleRequest'}))}D $$
